title: Salus populi suprema lex, or, The free thoughts of a well-wisher for a good settlement in a letter to a friend.
author: Stewart, James, Sir, 1635-1713.
notes: Added on t.p. of microfilm copy: By Iames Stewart.
Not to be confused with the work by Clement Barksdale appended to his Aurea dicta, 1681.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
